content: after years of making socks i finally discovered the pattern that works for me here i am sharing it with you i hope this pattern will help you become a sock knitter i generally knit my socks with either the magic loop method using a 32 cord or a 9 circular - where i use dpns to work the heels and toes find which way feels best in your hands while working this small circumference this pattern will provide you with all the links to techniques i use in these socks i also guide you how i have personally found out how long to knit my foot length i hope you enjoy
